## ICardReceiver interface

Interface for anything that can receive dealt cards.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICardReceiver<TCard> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [add(card)](./bge-core.icardreceiver.add.md) | Add a single card to the default place in this container. |
|  [addRange(cards)](./bge-core.icardreceiver.addrange.md) | Add a whole wad of cards to the default place in this container. |
